item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 15, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:

24. They see your photos (335 points | 188 comments)

26. Conversations are better with four people (193 points | 131 comments)
27. Show HN: Svader – Create GPU-rendered Svelte components (180 points | 41 comments)
